dcterms:creator: S. Mani

dcterms:description: The dataset contains bugs from the open Arch Linux bug tracker, where bugs are labeled in terms of various criteria such as priority and product area. The dataset includes 16,456 entries.
dcterms:title: Arch Linux bug tracker

dcterms:creator: S. Mani
A. Sankaran
R. Aralikatte
dcterms:description: The dataset adapted from the Chromium bug tracker contains entries labeled as Bug, Feature, or Compatibility issue. The complete dataset size contains 58,871 entries.
dcterms:title: Chromium bug tracker
